title: I have a transcript certificate with me. Should my university have to send directly transcripts to WES or can I send the documents to them? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you have it in sealed & signed on back flip of envelope issued by University then ask your University that you have transcript arrange it to send from their side. It is okay.
WES very specifically ask rather demand to receive tranacripts in sealed cover from ir respective university……..its better to comply with their requirements to avoid any dwlays in process..
